remarks: Decomposition of a vector into projections.  See comment in ~ axpjcl . (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axpjpj $p |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) ) $.
